general.Categories-included-in-the-WLDC-Official: Categories included in the WLDC Official Plan
general.Choose-the-additional-categories-you-wan: Choose the additional categories you want
general.Enter-the-number-of-people-to-register: Enter the number of people to register (Participants and assistants)
general.Hello-welcome-to-the-WLDC-app: Hello, welcome to the WLDC app!
general.Registration-Successful-text: You can now continue with the purchase process.
general.Room-with-king-bed-and-single-bed: Room with king bed and single bed
general.What-kind-of-beds-do-you-want: What kind of beds do you want?
general.What-kind-of-room-do-you-want: What kind of room do you want?
general.You-must-select-a-number-of-rooms: You must select a number of rooms.
general.additional-night-add-text: Please indicate the number of additional nights you wish to add to your reservation.
general.billing-information-text: To continue it is necessary to complete the following form, the information requested here will be used to issue passes to the event.
general.check-term-text: By registering you are accepting the personal data processing policies.
general.confirm-email-purchase: Soon you will receive a confirmation e-mail with the summary of the purchase.
general.modal-plan-details-eight: VIP entrance to watch the competition.
general.modal-plan-details-five: For the purchase of the all-inclusive plan competitors receive one (1) category at no cost.
general.modal-plan-details-four: Full Pass - Concert, Parties, Workshops, Conferences, Competition, Grand Final, Ultimate Championship, Music Park Fest, Pool Partys, Beaches, Gym.
general.modal-plan-details-nine: Priority to use the main stage to rehearse your choreography.
general.modal-plan-details-one: Airport Transfers Hotel - Airport Hotel: only for people arriving on 5 and 6 February and returning on 12 and 13 February 2023. Persons arriving earlier or returning after the dates indicated are not included in transfers.
general.modal-plan-details-seven: Benefits only for those who purchase September 10-30, 2022.
general.modal-plan-details-six: If you want to compete in more than one category you must buy additional categories.
general.modal-plan-details-ten: VIP kit with additional surprises to be received by the other attendees.
general.modal-plan-details-three: Full meal: breakfast, lunch and dinner, buffet style within the facilities at times set by the hotel.
general.modal-plan-details-two: Overnight at 5 star hotel, 'Hotel las Americas' from 6 to 12 February 2023, 6 nights and 7 days. After exhausting this hotel, the organization will designate the second official hotel of the event, of the same category.Transfers Airport Hotel - Airport Hotel: only for people arriving on 5 and 6 February and returning on 12 and 13 February 2023. Persons arriving earlier or returning after the dates indicated are not included in transfers.
general.name: Name
general.number-of-participants-text: Please indicate below the number of participants to register in the package
general.package-list-text: Need help? We can help you make your reservation, click
general.pre-sale-payment-cuotas-text: To continue the payment process for fees, you must read and accept the terms and conditions
general.pre-sale-payment-cuotas-text-five: After five (5) days, no payments will be refunded for installments that have been made and will not be met (Article 47 of Law 1480 of 2011).
general.pre-sale-payment-cuotas-text-four: Payments must be made before the due date. Otherwise you will lose the benefit of freezing the price and will have to pay the price that is currently in effect according to the price date and the system will automatically charge you the remaining value.
general.pre-sale-payment-cuotas-text-seven: IMPORTANT NOTE: the participants (participants and accompanying persons) at the time of registering and paying the registration, declare that they know the RULES OF THE CONTEST and undertake to comply with it.
general.pre-sale-payment-cuotas-text-six: It is not accepted to use payments made in installments in part from payments of other installments or new purchases.
general.pre-sale-payment-cuotas-text-three: When you pay in installments the price is automatically frozen as long as you meet the payment deadlines.
general.pre-sale-payment-cuotas-text-two: People will be able to pay on a installment plan that will be available at the time of payment, this installment plan will only go on the payment dates that are needed. For example, on the first payment date you can pay in 4 installments, on the second payment date you can pay in three installments and on the third payment date you can pay in only two installments.
general.register-text: If you are registered, you can click on the following link to enter
general.welcome-text: We are very happy to have your presence at WLDC 2024. Then you can make the purchase of packages to attend this great experience WLDC 2024 in France.

jumbotron.message: Entrepreneurs, investors, the industry and the national and international community convened for the first time in an unprecedented event. More than 80 exhibitors, 4,000 visitors, a press room, an international speaker and a use of technology as well as new trends will be the constants of an event that will mark the history of Colombia and Latin America.
jumbotron.subtitle: about event
jumbotron.title: First Xpo-Show of Cryptos and Blockchain from Colombia to the world.
